name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Raymond L. BARBER, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Raymond L. BARBER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The Judgment of Sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Lawrence County is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Norman J. Barilla, William M. Panella, New Castle, for appellant.
Donald E. Williams, Dist. Atty., New Castle, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
435 A.2d 177
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Raymond L. BARBER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 17, 1981.
Decided Oct. 8, 1981.
Norman J. Barilla, William M. Panella, New Castle, for appellant.
Donald E. Williams, Dist. Atty., New Castle, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
